features:
Weight : 490g
Volume : 20L
Dimensions: 46 / 26 / 18 (L x W x D) cm
Lite System: Out light backpacks for endurance sports and alpine day tours are reduced to the bare minimum. They are ideal for carrying light to medium loads (depending on the volume). Lightness doesn’t mean having to compromise on robustness!
Lightweight
Removable hip belt
Adjustable sternum belt
Elasticated inner compartment 
SOS Label: Provides the necessary instructions of what to do in an emergency
Compatible with 3L drinking system/bag
Rear light loop
Attachment loops for the helmet holder
Reflector
2 outer pockets
Valuables compartment
Contact system
